alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; Rutherford; Warren; Wilson (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 11 at 2:22PM CDT by NWS Nashville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Rutherford, northern Coffee, northwestern Warren, southeastern Wilson, northeastern Bedford and Cannon Counties through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Walterhill to near Manchester. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Woodbury, Smyrna, La Vergne, Watertown, Walterhill, Auburntown, Centertown, Lascassas, Beechgrove, Cedars Of Lebanon State Park, Bradyville, Milton and Readyville. This includes the following highways... Interstate 40 near mile marker 246. Interstate 24 between mile markers 80 and 104. Interstate 840 between mile markers 55 and 67. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bedford; Cannon; Coffee; Rutherford; Warren; Wilson
